info.name: MangaDB
info.description:
MangaDB allows you to easily keep track of the mangas you are reading,
want to read, and have already finished reading.

If you have any questions or want to contribute then [![Gitter](https://badges.gitter.im/Rafase282/Mangadb.svg)](https://gitter.im/Rafase282/Mangadb?utm_source=badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_campaign=pr-badge)

To create an admin account, you must specify it as a comma separated list on the `.env` file.


Contact Support:
 Name: rafase282@gmail.com

request.description: This route does notrequires a JWT. The usesr will get a message pointing to the documentation as there is nothign to do here.

response.name: Ok

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.name: Authentication

request.description: This route does notrequires a JWT, but instead provides one for the user that expires in one hour. The response provides the JWT along with some useful information.

response.name: Ok

Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: This route does not requires a JWT, but instead provides one  for the user that expires in five minutes. The  response provides the  JWT along with some useful information. This is used to get temporary access to change a password. The token will be sent via email and not returned on the payload.

response.name: Ok

item.name: Mangas

request.description: Users can only view their own content. However, the admin can also view it.

response.name: Ok

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Manga List Generated.",
    "data": [
        {
            "categories": [
                "action",
                "adventure",
                "comedy",
                "school life",
                "shounen",
                "supernatural"
            ],

                ""
            ],

            "title": "noblesse",
            "author": "son jae ho",
            "url": "https://readm.org/manga/5265",
            "userStatus": "reading",
            "type": "korean",
            "chapter": 477,
            "seriesStatus": "completed",
            "plot": "a vampire wakes up from a 820 year slumber in contemporary south korea. as the being adapts to his surroundings, he accidentally enrolls at a school...",
            "direction": "left to right",
            "userId": "58f41e960d4bc5456d078b03",
            "username": "rafase282",
            "__v": 0,
            "thumbnail": "https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736x/16/eb/a0/16eba0652688ba0fc713a6d1d84453ae.jpg"
        },
        {

                "action",

                "martial arts",

            ],
            "_id": "56ad8128d9ed5a8e3201b84c",
            "title": "dethrone",
            "author": "tashiro takuya",
            "url": "https://readm.org/manga/1699",
            "userStatus": "will read",
            "type": "japanese",
            "chapter": 1,
            "seriesStatus": "ongoing",
            "plot": "there exists a martial arts contest in japan that is of no concern to boys. girls who possess the dragon queen`s spirit gather at a special academy. the goal - fighting each other to make the soul of the dragon queen one once more. how? why? by fondling their defeated opponent`s breasts, of course!",
            "direction": "right to left",
            "userId": "58f41e960d4bc5456d078b03",
            "username": "rafase282",
            "__v": 0,
            "thumbnail": "https://readm.org/uploads/chapter_files/cover/tbn/Dethrone_198x0.jpg"
        }
    ]
}

urlencoded.description: (Required) Whether the user is currently reading or not.
(Required) Whether the series is ongoing or not.
(Required) The reading direction of the manga.
(Required) Direct url to a thumbnail of the manga.

request.description: The manga title should be unique. Please see the `Manga Schema`.

item.description:
Routes related to the Mangas Schema.

*   Get all Mangas by User
*   Get Manga By ID or Title
*   Create new Manga
*   Update Manga by Name or ID
*   Delete all Mangas by User
*   Delete Manga by ID or Title

item.name: Administrators

request.description: The admin uses this route to get a list of all the mangas and their data regardless of the user. Good for checking when you don't have access to the databse directly.

response.name: Ok

request.description: The route provides an array of user objects containing the details of the users.  However, passwords are always encrypted so admin can't read them.

response.name: Ok

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.description:
Routes which requires admin rights.

*   Get all Mangas on DB.
*   Get all users on DB.
*   Delete all Mangas on DB.
*   Delete all users but Admins.
*   Delete specific User.

item.name: Users

request.description: The route creates new regular users.  The only way to create an admin account is to specify the username in the server.

response.name: Ok

item.description:
Routes for user management. All routes for existing users utilize usernames as the ID.

*   Create User
*   Find user
*   Update User
*   Delete user
